text:
The only way I can get the ANTLR task to find the ANTLR jar file is to include 
it in a CLASSPATH environment variable.

creator: sbailliez@apache.org
text:
Fixed in CVS or wait for the next nightly build.
It implicitely adds antlr jar to the command line forked or not.

For convenience I added the possibility to specify the classpath to run antlr 
since I find the antlr way to run a bit strange.
I also added the possibility to tune the VM in forked mode.
the working directory is also no more required in forked mode (despites what 
the doc said, it was mandatory)

Thanks for the report.
